products.name: Floral Embroidered Smocked Dress
products.description: Beautiful blue and white smocked bodice dress with colorful floral embroidery on the tiered skirt. Perfect for summer occasions.

products.name: Scattered Floral Embroidered Shirt
products.description: White linen shirt with scattered colorful floral embroidery. Features a classic collar and button-down front.

products.name: Strappy Sandals Collection
products.description: Elegant strappy sandals available in green flat style and blue wedge espadrille. Perfect for summer outings.

products.name: Embroidered A-Line Skirt
products.description: Raspberry pink midi skirt with intricate embroidered hem detail and bow tie waist. Feminine and elegant.

products.name: Fringe Detail Wide Leg Jeans
products.description: Light wash denim jeans with unique fringe detailing along the outer seams. Modern and trendy style.

products.name: Geometric Print Camp Collar Shirt
products.description: Blue geometric patchwork print shirt with camp collar. Relaxed fit perfect for casual wear.

products.name: Floral Print Maxi Dress Set
products.description: Two-piece light blue floral print set with long-sleeve shirt dress and palazzo pants. Elegant modest fashion.

products.name: Streetwear Outfit Set
products.description: Complete outfit with white lace crop top, pink striped cargo pants, accessories, and chunky sneakers.

products.name: Ornate Silk Scarf
products.description: Luxurious silk scarf with vibrant blue, pink, green and yellow ornate pattern. Versatile styling piece.

products.name: Statement Jewelry Collection
products.description: Colorful jewelry set including bracelets, rings, cuff, and earrings with turquoise, coral, and gemstone accents.

products.name: Designer Watch Collection
products.description: Elegant watch collection featuring chronograph, floral face, smartwatch, and mesh band styles.

products.name: Embroidered Denim Jacket Set
products.description: Classic denim jackets - women's with floral embroidery and men's clean style. Perfect layering pieces.

products.name: Professional Leather Handbag Set
products.description: Black leather bag collection with structured tote and crossbody messenger. Gold hardware accents.

products.name: Leather Lace-Up Boots
products.description: Premium leather ankle boots in dark brown and tan. Classic cap-toe design with lace-up closure.

products.name: Athletic Sneaker Collection
products.description: Colorful athletic sneakers in white, black, grey, pink, and yellow. Comfortable and stylish.

products.name: Round Metal Frame Sunglasses
products.description: Classic round sunglasses with gold metal frame and dark lenses. Timeless style.

products.name: Wide Brim Straw Hat
products.description: Natural straw sun hat with wide brim and navy grosgrain ribbon band. Perfect sun protection.

products.name: Double-Breasted Wool Coat
products.description: Forest green wool blend coat with double-breasted button closure. Elegant and warm.

products.name: Patent Leather T-Strap Heels
products.description: Black patent leather pumps with T-strap ankle detail. Classic pointed toe and stiletto heel.

products.name: Sapphire Statement Jewelry Set
products.description: Luxurious gold-tone jewelry set with blue sapphire cabochons, crystal halos, and elegant design.
